backend/main.mo: Main Motoko backend actor defining submission types, access control, storage mixins, health endpoints, user profiles, and submission management logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by dropping session data while preserving submissions, profiles, and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend/backend features, affected files, components, and associated requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/FFMPEG_SETUP.md: Empty placeholder file intended for future FFmpeg setup instructions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining color variables, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React frontend and mounts it into the root element.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation outlining features, architecture, security model, admin flow, and development setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all public and admin routes wrapped in the app shell and theme provider.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Defines Candid IDL types and service interface for backend calls including submissions, admin actions, user profiles, and media handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAudio: Downloads audio blobs with inferred or provided MIME types and handles loading state.
Streams and plays admin audio blobs with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMedia: Downloads audio or video blobs with MIME type inference and dynamic filenames.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSubmi: Button component that triggers backend submission download and shows loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminVideo: Loads a video blob URL for admin playback with loading and error handling inside a card UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteSubm: Confirmation dialog and button to delete a submission using a mutation and then navigate away.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExportTool: Provides CSV export of submission metadata and a placeholder ZIP export action.
A route guard that checks admin status and redirects or blocks access with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the main layout with header, footer, navigation, and admin-specific links, hiding them on the success page.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Implements an in-browser audio recorder with preview, duration limits, error handling, and file export.
frontend/src/components/LocalCaptchaChal: Renders a simple math CAPTCHA requiring correct input before proceeding.
frontend/src/dev/ffmpegSmoke.ts: Empty placeholder file for ffmpeg-related development tests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecorder.ts: Custom hook handling audio recording, pause/resume, timing, mime selection, and blob output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, storing identity state and exposing auth helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles and submissions, wrapping backend actor calls with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/adminApi.ts: Provides admin authentication helpers for login, logout, and session checks using a backend actor and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file for future admin auth logic.
frontend/src/lib/adminDownloads.ts: Implements admin-only submission download logic, fetching MP3 data from the backend and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Empty placeholder file for admin session utilities.
frontend/src/lib/audio/audioDecodeErrors: Defines custom audio error classes and helpers for identifying and formatting audio decoding and conversion errors.
Provides client-side recorded-audio-to-MP3 conversion using Web Audio API and lamejs, with progress reporting.
frontend/src/lib/audioValidation.ts: Validates audio files for size, extension, and MIME type, and includes helpers for formatting file size and duration.
frontend/src/lib/csrf.ts: Implements simple CSRF token storage and header attachment using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/downloads.ts: Contains generic helpers for downloading blobs or URLs through browser-triggered downloads.
frontend/src/lib/ffmpeg/convertToMp3.ts: Empty placeholder file for future FFmpeg-based MP3 conversion.
frontend/src/lib/icActor.ts: Initializes and caches a DFINITY backend actor with environment-based canister config and optional identity support.
frontend/src/lib/mediaMime.ts: Provides MIME type normalization and utilities to map between MIME types and file extensions, infer types, and generate safe filenames.
frontend/src/lib/safeText.ts: Contains text sanitization, truncation, and HTML escaping helpers.
frontend/src/lib/submissionFormat.ts: Formats timestamps, file sizes, durations, and submission IDs for display.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Deprecated video validation utilities for admins, including size and format checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing searchable, sortable submissions with error handling and export tools.
Checks admin permissions on load and shows access status or denial message.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Provides UI for viewing and modifying admin settings like CAPTCHA and upload limits.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Renders an audit log page with client-side filtering for action type and date ranges, displaying entries fetched from useGetAuditLog. Shows alerts and tables with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SubmissionDetai: Fetches and displays full details for a specific submission, including media playback, metadata, timestamps, and deletion. Handles loading, errors, and navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StudentUploadPage.tsx: Implements the student audio upload form with validation, recording, CAPTCHA, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Displays a confirmation message after successful submission.
frontend/src/types/lamejs.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type definitions for the lamejs MP3 encoder exposed on the global window object.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hashâ€‘based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, plugins, and container settings for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements focused on correct backend actor initialization, health checks, and fixing deployment issues where the frontend cannot reach the backend.
